question:
The reaction of $CH_4$ with $Cl_2$ to yield $CH_3Cl$ and $HCl$ is well known. On the basis of the values in the short table below, the enthalpy $\Delta H^o (kcal mol^{-1})$ of this reaction is (a) +135 
(b) -135 
(c) +25 
(d) -25

Bond-Dissociation Energies $\Delta H^o (kcal mol^{-1})$     
|||| |
| ---- | ---- | ---- | ---- |
|H–Cl  |   103   |  Cl–Cl    |   58   | 
|H3C–Cl|   103   |    H3C–H  |   105   |
